roleset.name: pursue women excessively,
roleset.note: WOMANIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'womanize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from womanize.01-v predicate notes)
WOMANIZING-N NOTES: No comparison, no VN entry. Framed by Claire (from womanizing.01-n)

example.name: one example, one arg
example.text: The opening show featured [a secretary of defense designate]-1 accused [*]-1 of [*-1] womanizing (a la John Tower).

example.name: All arguments
example.text: His womanizing of aboriginal ladies throughout the New York colony was so prodigious that it prompted rumours he had fathered children by the hundreds.
